Package org.cesecore.keys.validation

Enum ValidatorCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ValidatorCache>
      • org.cesecore.keys.validation.ValidatorCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ValidatorCache>, CommonCache<Validator>
    public enum ValidatorCache
extends Enum<ValidatorCache>
implements CommonCache<Validator>
    Key validator object and name to id lookup cache. Configured through CesecoreConfiguration.getCacheKeyValidatorTime().
    Version:
    $Id: ValidatorCache.java 28332 2018-02-20 14:40:52Z anatom $

      • willUpdate

        public boolean willUpdate​(int id,
                          int digest)
        Description copied from interface: CommonCache
        this method exposes the loginc inside updateWith that determines if an object is the same as the cached object. If the objects are the same, updateWith will not update the object as an optimization. This method can be used to skip expensive object creation if the objects are anyway the same and updateWith will not end up doing anything
        Specified by:
        willUpdate in interface CommonCache<Validator>
        Parameters:
        id - id of the object, typically database id
        digest - typically getProtectString(0).hashCode() of the object;
        Returns:
        true if a call to updateWith will perform an actual cache update
